scenario: The Olympic team selection committee is convening to evaluate athlete qualifications, balancing public performance metrics with private health and sponsorship information.
task: Develop a selection strategy that integrates athlete performance data, health considerations, and sponsorship commitments while ensuring fairness and transparency in the selection process. The committee must navigate conflicting priorities around athlete eligibility, health disclosures, and sponsorship pressures, sharing information judiciously to build consensus without compromising athlete confidentiality or sponsor relationships.
